doc:
Francis Matthews (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_Matthews_(actor) 0 Francis Matthews (2 September 1927 – 14 June 2014) was an English actor best known for playing Paul Temple in the BBC television series of the same name and for voicing Captain Scarlet in Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons. Francis_Matthews ( 2_September_1927 – 14_June_2014 ) was an_English_actor best_known for playing Paul_Temple in the_BBC_television_series of the_same_name and for voicing Captain_Scarlet in Captain_Scarlet and the_Mysterons .
